channel.title: yudel tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from yudel.

item.description: @sketchygothandz @IMCJasonD Every Republican thinks they can be Mitt Romney.
item.source:markdown: @sketchygothandz @IMCJasonD Every Republican thinks they can be Mitt Romney.

item.description: @KalmanYeger @YWN Hey, is it true that 9/11 was just like attending one of your city’s public schools? https://t.co/LQjiBtW2g1
item.source:markdown: @KalmanYeger @YWN Hey, is it true that 9/11 was just like attending one of your city’s public schools? https://t.co/LQjiBtW2g1

item.description: @jh_swanson The worst attack, but not as deadly as attending a NYC public school, if the recent ad in a haredi publication is to be believed. https://t.co/CJUMP9JSuC
item.source:markdown: @jh_swanson The worst attack, but not as deadly as attending a NYC public school, if the recent ad in a haredi publication is to be believed. https://t.co/CJUMP9JSuC

item.description:
@AD_Lobel Too soon.

@AD_Lobel Assuming you’re counting the Omer, which is really the only acceptable use of Arabic numerals.

item.description: Caught about the same time as Jonathan Pollard, this spy did not market himself as a Jewish hero. https://t.co/cMDL279cSb

item.description:
@greg_shill The lines between being old, adamant, and an unapologetic asshole are exceedingly thin.

@greg_shill As someone who tends toward being adamant and is growing ever older, this is a cautionary tale.
item.source:markdown:

item.description: Easy to get at your local CVS. Can be combined with other vaccine such as covid or flu. Two doses. Highly recommend. https://t.co/AdEAgYPVLy
item.source:markdown: Easy to get at your local CVS. Can be combined with other vaccine such as covid or flu. Two doses. Highly recommend. https://t.co/AdEAgYPVLy

item.description: As a 9/11’s worth of Americans continue to die from covid each week, a look at the depraved ideological forces that made surrender to the virus the “sensible” policy choice. https://t.co/5AX4QAYPqh

item.description: @HannahLebovits These are my people! Say hi to my grandfather and his radical sister-in-law, my Great Aunt “Red” Josephine Heyman.
